title.rendered: Sharna Burgess and Brian Austin Green Welcome First Child!!!!!

content.rendered:
Reading Time: 3 minutes

Blessed and exciting news to share today out of Hollywood:

Brian Austin Green and Sharna Burgess are first-time parents!

The long-time actor and his professional dancer girlfriend welcomed their first baby together three days ago, according to Green on Instagram, as the star wrote the following last night, along with two heart emojis:

“Zane Walker Green born 6/28 at 12:12.”

Green included with this caption a black and white photo of the newborn wrapped in a blanket … holding on to his index finger.

Burgess shared the same snapshot and caption on her Instagram page, although the new mom added to the caption by stating:

“My heart is now forever outside of my body.”

For Green, this is his FIFTH child overall.

He has a now-20-year old son with ex Vanessa Marcil; and three more sons with ex Megan Fox: Noah, 9, Bodhi, 8, and Journey, 5.

Earlier this month, the former Beverly Hills, 90210 cast member told People Magazine that his children are “super excited” to bring a new addition into the family.

“They check on Sharna every day and they rub her belly and talk to the baby. They’re counting down the days!” Green told this outlet, adding:

“[The baby] is definitely coming into a super warm household and family and he’ll be surrounded by a lot of love. It’s exciting.”

Green and Burgess made their romance Instagram official way back in January 2021 after the the Dancing with the Stars pro uploaded a photo of the pair kissing on a hotel balcony..

The 36-year old captioned the post, HIM.

In February of this year, she then announced she was pregnant.

“And suddenly my world would never be the same,” the Australia native wrote via Instagram at the time.

“Forever greater, forever expanded and deeper. Forever abundant and unconditional.

“Baby Boy July 4th (ish) 2022. @brianaustingreen I love our family, I love that it’s growing and I love you. How did we get so lucky.”

Burgess was actually on birth control when she conceived, revealing in a March Instagram Story that the baby news was NOT something she saw coming.

“We were thinking of trying mid to late this year lol. But the Universe made her own plan, found a window and went for it,” she said at the time.

“Why not now? We are big believers in everything happening for a reason.

“There was definitely Divine timing with this one and we are excited about it, trusting in it.”

Congratulations to Brian Austin Green and Sharna Burgess!

excerpt.rendered: Reading Time: 3 minutesHooray for Sharna Burgess and Brian Austin Green! They are first-time parents together.
